main event: A civilian reported seeing a large circular lighted object in San Antonio, Texas on May 7, 1953, for approximately 20-30 seconds.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be between forty and fifty feet in diameter., The object was observed moving silently in a northeastern direction., Witness reported that the object appeared dark and was illuminated by unknown lights., The sighting occurred at around 8:55 PM and was visible for about 20-30 seconds., The witness described having a feeling of awe and found the object's size and speed unusual for an aircraft.
witness description: Civil service employee at Kelly AFB, male, age 26.
